com.complexible.common.protocols.server.rpc

Class RPCServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.protocols.server.rpc.RPCServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Server

    public class RPCServer
extends Object
implements Server

    Simple RPC server backed by the Netty stack which uses Shiro for authentications services.

    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    4.0
    Author:
    Michael Grove, Fernando Hernandez
    See Also:
    ServerHandler, Protocol

      • address

        public SocketAddress address()
        Return the address of this server. This is where the server is listening, when running, or where it will run once started.
        Specified by:
        address in interface Server
        Returns:
        the address of the server

      • start

        public Server start()
             throws ServerException
        Start this server so it can accept requests from clients. This has no effect if the server is already running.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Server
        Returns:
        this server
        Throws:
        ServerException - if the server cannot be started

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop this server so it can no longer receive client requests. This has no effect if the server is not running.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Server

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        Return whether or not the server is running
        Specified by:
        isRunning in interface Server
        Returns:
        true if the server is running, false otherwise
